select a.*,swotd.name as work_order_subclass_name from ( select (case sdld.create_id is null when true then -1 else sdld.create_id end) as create_id,sdld.work_order_type_detail,sdld.type as dispatch_type,swotl.name as work_order_limit_name from sys_report_repair as srr,sys_dispatch_list as sdl LEFT JOIN sys_dispatch_list_detail as sdld on sdld.dispatch_list_id = sdl.id LEFT JOIN sys_work_order_time_limit as swotl on swotl.id = sdld.work_order_time_limit where srr.dispatch_list_id = sdl.id and sdl.sys_delete = 1 and srr.id = #{repairId} ) as a LEFT JOIN sys_work_order_type_detail as swotd on swotd.id = a.work_order_type_detail where a.create_id = -1 or a.create_id = #{id}
